t: Amazon Brand Registry | Sell on Amazon
s: Enroll your brand in Amazon Brand Registry to unlock tools designed to protect and build your brand, creating a better experience for your Amazon customers.

After enrolling your brand in Amazon Brand Registry, only you and other sellers associated with your brand can create or suggest updates to your product detail pages using our standard listing processes. That helps ensure the accuracy of your product information and improves the customer experience.

t: Can I still brand a product on Amazon if someone already listed it? - Quora
s: Answer: Yes, you can still brand a product on Amazon even if someone else has already listed it. However, you may need to contact the seller of the product to see if they will allow you to use the product for your brand.
